CASE WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND ( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NULL OR <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> ='') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PID]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND (<refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NOT NULL and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> <>'') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='ESW' THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PID]</refobj> END

CASE WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND ( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NULL OR <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> ='') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PRODID]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND (<refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NOT NULL and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> <>'') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='ESW' THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PRODID]</refobj> END

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="PARENT_7"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>CASE WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND ( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NULL OR <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> ='') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PRODID_7]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='DSW' AND (<refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> IS NOT NULL and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj> <>'') THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[COMPONENTPN_7]</refobj> WHEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PARTTYPE]</refobj> ='ESW' THEN <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PRODID_7]</refobj> END</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="PRODID"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>CASE
WHEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>   ='DSW' AND  <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj>    =''
THEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PRODID]</refobj>  
WHEN<refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>   ='DSW' AND <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj>   <>''
THEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN]</refobj>  
WHEN<refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>    ='ESW' 
THEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PRODID]</refobj>  
END

</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="PROD_7"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>CASE
WHEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>   ='DSW' AND  <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN_7]</refobj>  =''
THEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PRODID_7]</refobj>  
WHEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>   ='DSW' AND  <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN_7]</refobj>  <>''
THEN   <refobj>[Database Layer].[COMPONENT].[COMPONENTPN_7]</refobj> 
WHEN<refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PARTTYPE]</refobj>    ='ESW' 
THEN <refobj>[Database Layer].[PART].[PRODID_7]</refobj>  
END</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="PAYMENT_TYPE"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case 
when <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[FIXED_PAYMENTS]</refobj>   <> '' and  
(<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_VOLUMES]</refobj>  <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_USAGE]</refobj>  <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_REVENUE]</refobj>   <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_BILLING]</refobj>     <> '' )  then 'FIXED/VARIABLE'
when   <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[FIXED_PAYMENTS]</refobj> <> ''   then 'FIXED'
when (<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_VOLUMES]</refobj>  <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_USAGE]</refobj>  <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_REVENUE]</refobj>   <> '' OR
<refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[VARIABLE_BY_BILLING]</refobj>     <> '' )   then 'VARIABLE'
else 'PAYMENT TYPE UNDEFINED'
end</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="PAYMENT_METHOD"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case
when   (  <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[PAYS_BY_ALLIANT]</refobj>  = 'Y ' and  <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[PAYS_BY_PO]</refobj>   =  'Y')  then 'ALLIANT AND PO'
when    <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[PAYS_BY_ALLIANT]</refobj>  = 'Y'  then  'ALLIANT'
when   <refobj>[Database Layer].[CONTRACT].[PAYS_BY_PO]</refobj> = 'Y' then 'PO' 
else  'undefined/inactive'    
end</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="removeObject"><parameters><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="objectID" value="[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[Max Month]"/></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="Max Month"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>maximum ( case when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj> =year(current_date) then <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> end for report )</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj>, char(4)) || case length ( rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) ) when 1 then '0'|| rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) when 2 then rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) end

cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj>, char(4)) || case length ( rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) ) when 1 then '0'|| rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) when 2 then rtrim(cast( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> ,char(2))) end
maximum ( case when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj> =extract(year,current_date) then <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> end for report )

( <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj> =extract(year,current_date)-1 and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MONTH]</refobj> >=<refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[Max Month]</refobj> ) or <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[YEAR]</refobj> =extract(year,current_date)

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="MIN MONTH IN PREV QTR"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case 
when <refobj>[Database Layer].[DATES].[YEARQTR]</refobj> =
(case 
when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (1,2,3) then  cast(extract (year, current_date  )-1,char(4)) ||'04'
when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (4,5,6) then cast(extract (year, current_date  ),char(4))||'01'
when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (7,8,9) then cast(extract (year, current_date  ),char(4))||'02'
when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (10,11,12) then cast(extract (year, current_date  ),char(4))||'03'
end) then minimum (  <refobj>[Database Layer].[DATES].[YEARMONTH]</refobj> )
else null

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="MAX MONTH IN PREV QTR"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case

when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (7,8,9) then cast(extract (year, current_date  ),char(4))||'02'
when extract ( month, current_date  ) in (10,11,12) then cast(extract (year, current_date  ),char(4))||'03'
end) then maximum (    <refobj>[Database Layer].[DATES].[YEARMONTH]</refobj> )
else null
end</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="customer_type"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression><refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[AT_customer_type]</refobj> </expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="new_rev_type"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj> ='GREEN' and  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj>  ='TRANS' then '1 TRANS'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj> ='GREEN' and  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj>  in ('STREAM','SAAS') then '2 STREAM'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj> in ('COMMERCIAL','INTERNAL') and  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj> ='TRANS' then '1 TRANS'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj> in ('COMMERCIAL','INTERNAL') and  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj>  ='STREAM' then  '2 STREAM'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj> in ('COMMERCIAL','INTERNAL') then '3 BLUE UNDEFINED'
end   </expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="rev_sub_type"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj>  ='GREEN' and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj> ='SAAS' then '2.1 SAAS'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj>  ='GREEN' and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[new_rev_type]</refobj> ='2 STREAM' and 
<refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[PLATFORM]</refobj>   in ( 'S/390') and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[MAJOR]</refobj> ='332' then '2.2 zMLC'
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[customer_type]</refobj>  ='GREEN' and <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[new_rev_type]</refobj> ='2 STREAM'  then '2.3 S&S'
else <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[new_rev_type]</refobj>  
end
</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="revenue_type"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression>case
when <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj> ='BLUE $' Then (

case
when  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[ACTIVITY_TYPE]</refobj>  in ('N','DMLI','DMLC','O','8','9')  Then 'TRANS'
when  <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[ACTIVITY_TYPE]</refobj>  in ('L','T','W','K','U','J','SASI','SASC') Then 'STREAM'
else 'Blue Undet'
end
)
else <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[REVENUE_TYPE]</refobj>  
end</expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

<updateObjectRequest><tasks><task name="addObject"><parameters><param locale="en" name="objectName" value="REV_SUBTYPE_FIN"/><param name="objectType" value="queryItem"/><param name="makeNameUnique" value="false"/><param name="basedOn"><expression><refobj>[Database Layer].[ACCOUNTING].[REV_SUBTYPE_FIN]</refobj></expression></param></parameters></task></tasks></updateObjectRequest>

IF ( <refobj>[Database Layer].[ACTIVITY].[TX_TYPE]</refobj> in ('INTERNAL', 'COMMERCIAL') or <refobj>[Modelling Layer].[Payments].[DATATYPE]</refobj> = 'TPS' ) THEN ('Blue') ELSE (<refobj>[Database Layer].[ACCOUNTING].[REV_TYPE_FIN]</refobj> )
